title: Jeff Tweedy talks about what led to Wilco's first true country album
description: Cruel Country, the group's 12th studio album, is a meditation on the current state of affairs in America, one that is complicated and flawed, as Jeff Tweedy tells it.
itunes:title: Jeff Tweedy talks about what led to Wilco's first true country album
itunes:author: Stephen Kallao
itunes:summary: Cruel Country, the group's 12th studio album, is a meditation on the current state of affairs in America, one that is complicated and flawed, as Jeff Tweedy tells it.
